verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4467>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azur<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was of <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>speaks<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H5750>Within<s%> two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> will I <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> into <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> away from <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H935>carried<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon:<s%>

And I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Then the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

Even the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>Amen:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6965>perform<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H1473>carried<s%> away <S%H1473>captive,<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> you <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> that I <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H241>ears,<s%> and in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me and <S%H6440>before<s%> you of <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> both <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H776>countries,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and of <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5012>prophesies<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> when the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to pass, then shall the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> be <S%H3045>known,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H571>truly<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him.

Then <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4133>yoke<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah's<s%> <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> it.

And <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3602>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3602>Even<s%> <S%H3602>so<s%> will I <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> from the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5750>within<s%> the <S%H5750>space<s%> of two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way.<s%>

Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the prophet, <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> had <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>yoke<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> You have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>yokes<s%> of <S%H6086>wood;<s%> but you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for them <S%H4133>yokes<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> on the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him: and I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah;<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> you; but you make <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H982>trust<s%> in a <S%H8267>lie.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>cast<s%> you from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth:<s%> this <S%H8141>year<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H1696>taught<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
